name: Dingy Cell Block, Colosseum Auxiliary Building
description: Three heroes are locked in a cell with cobblestone floors and dimly lit torch lights.

door.message: It's the cell door. It looks sturdy.

prisoner.name: Rex
prisoner.message: He is staring at you, smirking.

desk.message: A typical desk. Nothing seems remarkable about it.

bed.message: These were not comfortable to sleep in last night.

name: Prison Corridor
description: You step over the bodies of the guards and into the prison block hallway.

chest.message: A wooden chest sits in the corner.

cabinet.message: A medical cabinet on the wall.
